name: BAI YUN® Grey Waterproof General Purpose Sealant One Component Silicone Sealant
description: BAI YUN® Gray Waterproof General Purpose Sealant One Component Silicone Sealant SS850 General Purpose Silicone Sealant is one-component, neutral curing, general purpose construction silicone sealant with good adhesion to glass, aluminum, cement, concrete etc., specially designed for sealing in all type door ,window and wall joints.
